code:
%% Dashboard class diagram — focused on widgets, overview, reports, transactions, uploads/OCR, notifications, cache, and external libs
%% Shows: Generalization, Composition, Aggregation, Association, Dependency
classDiagram
%% layout left-to-right for readability
direction LR

class Dashboard {
	+render()
	+refreshData()
	+openWidget(id)
}

class Widget {
	+render()
	+resize()
}

class OverviewTab {
	+loadOverview()
	+refreshSummary()
}



class Transaction {
	+id
	+amount
	+date
}

class DuesSection {
	+listDues()
}

class CategoryChart {
	+renderChart(data)
}

class Upload {
	+fileName
	+upload()
}

class OCRService {
	+extractText(file)
}

class NotificationService {
	+sendToUsers(payload)
}

class Cache {
	+get(key)
	+set(key, value)
}

class AwsS3
%% Relationships demonstrating the five kinds

%% Composition: Dashboard composes Widgets (widgets lifecycle tied to Dashboard)
Dashboard "1" *-- "*" Widget : composes

%% Aggregation: Dashboard aggregates OverviewTab (Overview can exist independently)
Dashboard "1" o-- "1" OverviewTab : aggregates

%% Association: OverviewTab reads Transactions (regular association)
OverviewTab "1" --> "*" Transaction : displays

%% Composition (strong) between DuesSection and Transaction (dues contain transactions)
DuesSection "1" *-- "*" Transaction : contains

%% Generalization: CategoryChart is a kind of Widget
CategoryChart <|-- Widget

%% Aggregation: Uploads stored via AwsS3 (S3 is an external resource aggregated)
Upload "*" o-- "1" AwsS3 : stores

%% Association: Upload depends on OCRService to process files
Upload "1" --> "1" OCRService : uses

%% Dependency: Dashboard depends on NotificationService (sends alerts)
Dashboard ..> NotificationService : notifies

%% Cache usage (dependency) — Dashboard/Overview use Cache for fast reads
OverviewTab ..> Cache : caches
Dashboard ..> Cache : caches

%% Multiplicities and labels to clarify relationships
Widget "0..*" -- "1" Dashboard : parent
CategoryChart "1" -- "1" Widget : is-a

%% End
